helpgrid.innerhtml: You can click Copy WOs, Tickets, and SOs to copy all of the work orders, tickets, and sales orders to the bill batch. You can also use the Select Work Orders, Select Sales Orders, or Select Tickets buttons to select individual work orders, tickets, and sales orders to include in the bill batch

table.label: Bill Batch Totals by Service Group

dialog.label: Advance all WAPPR Lines to APPR

helpgrid.innerhtml: All Lines in this Batch that are in WAPPR status will be advanced to APPR Status.
